commands.name: !pula
commands.message: if(commandName === '!pula') {try {let i = CommandDB.getIndex('/commands', _$.name, 'name');if(args[0].toLowerCase() === 'sim' && !_$.users.includes(context.username)) {_$.yes = _$.yes + 1;_$.users = [..._$.users, context.username];CommandDB.push(`/commands[${i}]`, _$, false);return `@${context.username}, Votou para pular a mÃºsica e tem ${_$.yes} votos.`} else if((args[0].toLowerCase() === 'nao' || args[0].toLowerCase() === 'nÃ£o') && !_$.users.includes(context.username)) {_$.no = _$.no + 1;_$.users = [..._$.users, context.username];CommandDB.push(`/commands[${i}]`, _$, true);return `@${context.username}, Votou para pular a mÃºsica e tem ${_$.no} votos.`} else if(args[0].toLowerCase() === 'reset' && context['user-type'] !== '') {_$.yes = 0;_$.no = 0;_$.users=[];CommandDB.push(`/commands[${i}]`, _$, false);} else if(args[0].toLowerCase() === 'result' && context['user-type'] !== '') { return `O resultado da votaÃ§Ã£o foi... Sim: ${_$.yes} X NÃ£o: ${_$.no}` }} catch(e) {console.log(e);}}
